1: וְיָצָ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And there shall come forth</n> חֹ֖טֶר <sup>2415 </sup> <n>a rod</n> מִגֵּ֣זַע <sup>1503 </sup> <n>out of the stem</n> יִשָׁ֑י <sup>3448 </sup> <n>of Jesse</n> וְנֵ֖צֶר <sup>5342 </sup> <n>and a Branch</n> מִשָּׁרָשָׁ֥יו <sup>8328 </sup> <n>out of his roots</n> יִפְרֶֽה׃ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>shall grow</n>
2: וְנָחָ֥ה <sup>5117 </sup> <n>shall rest</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> ר֣וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>And the spirit</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> ר֧וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>upon him the spirit</n> חָכְמָ֣ה <sup>2451 </sup> <n>of wisdom</n> וּבִינָ֗ה <sup>998 </sup> <n>and understanding</n> ר֤וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the spirit</n> עֵצָה֙ <sup>6098 </sup> <n>of counsel</n> וּגְבוּרָ֔ה <sup>1369 </sup> <n>and might</n> ר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the spirit</n> דַּ֖עַת <sup>1847 </sup> <n>of knowledge</n> וְיִרְאַ֥ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>and of the fear</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
3: וַהֲרִיח֖וֹ <sup>7306 </sup> <n>And shall make him of quick understanding</n> בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>in the fear</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לְמַרְאֵ֤ה <sup>4758 </sup> <n>after the sight</n> עֵינָיו֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>of his eyes</n> יִשְׁפּ֔וֹט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>and he shall not judge</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> לְמִשְׁמַ֥ע <sup>4926 </sup> <n>after the hearing</n> אָזְנָ֖יו <sup>241 </sup> <n>of his ears</n> יוֹכִֽיחַ׃ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>neither reprove</n>
4: וְשָׁפַ֤ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>shall he judge</n> בְּצֶ֙דֶק֙ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>But with righteousness</n> דַּלִּ֔ים <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> וְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <sup>3198 </sup> <n>and reprove</n> בְּמִישׁ֖וֹר <sup>4334 </sup> <n>with equity</n> לְעַנְוֵי־ <sup>6035 </sup> <n>for the meek</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְהִֽכָּה־ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and he shall smite</n> אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> בְּשֵׁ֣בֶט <sup>7626 </sup> <n>with the rod</n> פִּ֔יו <sup>6310 </sup> <n>of his mouth</n> וּבְר֥וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>and with the breath</n> שְׂפָתָ֖יו <sup>8193 </sup> <n>of his lips</n> יָמִ֥ית <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall he slay</n> רָשָֽׁע׃ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n>
5: וְהָ֥יָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> צֶ֖דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>And righteousness</n> אֵז֣וֹר <sup>232 </sup> <n>shall be the girdle</n> מָתְנָ֑יו <sup>4975 </sup> <n>of his loins</n> וְהָאֱמוּנָ֖ה <sup>530 </sup> <n>and faithfulness</n> אֵז֥וֹר <sup>232 </sup> <n>the girdle</n> חֲלָצָֽיו׃ <sup>2504 </sup> <n>of his reins</n>
6: וְגָ֤ר <sup>1481 </sup> <n>also shall dwell</n> זְאֵב֙ <sup>2061 </sup> <n>The wolf</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כֶּ֔בֶשׂ <sup>3532 </sup> <n>with the lamb</n> וְנָמֵ֖ר <sup>5246 </sup> <n>and the leopard</n> עִם־ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> גְּדִ֣י <sup>1423 </sup> <n>with the kid</n> יִרְבָּ֑ץ <sup>7257 </sup> <n>shall lie down</n> וְעֵ֨גֶל <sup>5695 </sup> <n>and the calf</n> וּכְפִ֤יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>and the young lion</n> וּמְרִיא֙ <sup>4806 </sup> <n>and the fatling</n> יַחְדָּ֔ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> וְנַ֥עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>child</n> קָטֹ֖ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>and a little</n> נֹהֵ֥ג <sup>5090 </sup> <n>shall lead</n> בָּֽם׃
7: וּפָרָ֤ה <sup>6510 </sup> <n>And the cow</n> וָדֹב֙ <sup>1677 </sup> <n>and the bear</n> תִּרְעֶ֔ינָה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>shall feed</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> יִרְבְּצ֣וּ <sup>7257 </sup> <n>shall lie down</n> יַלְדֵיהֶ֑ן <sup>3206 </sup> <n>their young ones</n> וְאַרְיֵ֖ה <sup>738 </sup> <n>and the lion</n> כַּבָּקָ֥ר <sup>1241 </sup> <n>like the ox</n> יֹֽאכַל־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall eat</n> תֶּֽבֶן׃ <sup>8401 </sup> <n>straw</n>
8: וְשִֽׁעֲשַׁ֥ע <sup>8173 </sup> <n>shall play</n> יוֹנֵ֖ק <sup>3243 </sup> <n>And the sucking child</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> חֻ֣ר <sup>2356 </sup> <n>cave</n> פָּ֑תֶן <sup>6620 </sup> <n>of the asp</n> וְעַל֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מְאוּרַ֣ת <sup>3975 </sup> <n>den</n> צִפְעוֹנִ֔י <sup>6848 </sup> <n>on the cockatrice'</n> גָּמ֖וּל <sup>1580 </sup> <n>and the weaned child</n> יָד֥וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> הָדָֽה׃ <sup>1911 </sup> <n>shall put</n>
9: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>They will not</n> יָרֵ֥עוּ <sup>7489 </sup> <n>They shall not hurt</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> יַשְׁחִ֖יתוּ <sup>7843 </sup> <n>nor destroy</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountain</n> קָדְשִׁ֑י <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in all my holy</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מָלְאָ֣ה <sup>4390 </sup> <n>shall be full</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for the earth</n> דֵּעָה֙ <sup>1844 </sup> <n>of the knowledge</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> כַּמַּ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>as the waters</n> לַיָּ֥ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>the sea</n> מְכַסִּֽים׃ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>cover</n> פ
10: וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And in that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> שֹׁ֣רֶשׁ <sup>8328 </sup> <n>there shall be a root</n> יִשַׁ֗י <sup>3448 </sup> <n>of Jesse</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> עֹמֵד֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>which shall stand</n> לְנֵ֣ס <sup>5251 </sup> <n>for an ensign</n> עַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> גּוֹיִ֣ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>to it shall the Gentiles</n> יִדְרֹ֑שׁוּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>seek</n> וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מְנֻחָת֖וֹ <sup>4496 </sup> <n>and his rest</n> כָּבֽוֹד׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>shall be glorious</n> פ
11: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will happen</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass in that day</n> הַה֗וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יוֹסִ֨יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>again</n> אֲדֹנָ֤י ׀ <sup>136 </sup> <n>[that] the Lord</n> שֵׁנִית֙ <sup>8145 </sup> <n>the second time</n> יָד֔וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> לִקְנ֖וֹת <sup>7069 </sup> <n>to recover</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁאָ֣ר <sup>7605 </sup> <n>the remnant</n> עַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of his people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> יִשָּׁאֵר֩ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>which shall be left</n> מֵאַשּׁ֨וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>from Assyria</n> וּמִמִּצְרַ֜יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>and from Egypt</n> וּמִפַּתְר֣וֹס <sup>6624 </sup> <n>and from Pathros</n> וּמִכּ֗וּשׁ <sup>3568 </sup> <n>and from Cush</n> וּמֵעֵילָ֤ם <sup>5867 </sup> <n>and from Elam</n> וּמִשִּׁנְעָר֙ <sup>8152 </sup> <n>and from Shinar</n> וּמֵ֣חֲמָ֔ת <sup>2574 </sup> <n>and from Hamath</n> וּמֵאִיֵּ֖י <sup>339 </sup> <n>and from the islands</n> הַיָּֽם׃ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n>
12: וְנָשָׂ֥א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And he shall set up</n> נֵס֙ <sup>5251 </sup> <n>an ensign</n> לַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>for the nations</n> וְאָסַ֖ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>and shall assemble</n> נִדְחֵ֣י <sup>1760 </sup> <n>the outcasts</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וּנְפֻצ֤וֹת <sup>5310 </sup> <n>the dispersed</n> יְהוּדָה֙ <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> יְקַבֵּ֔ץ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>and gather together</n> מֵאַרְבַּ֖ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>from the four</n> כַּנְפ֥וֹת <sup>3671 </sup> <n>corners</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n>
13: וְסָ֙רָה֙ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>shall depart</n> קִנְאַ֣ת <sup>7068 </sup> <n>The envy</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>also of Ephraim</n> וְצֹרְרֵ֥י <sup>6862 </sup> <n>adversary</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> יִכָּרֵ֑תוּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>shall be cut off</n> אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְקַנֵּ֣א <sup>7065 </sup> <n>shall not envy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>Judah</n> וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>and Judah</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָצֹ֥ר <sup>6887 </sup> <n>and the adversaries</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n>
14: וְעָפ֨וּ <sup>5774 </sup> <n>But they shall fly</n> בְכָתֵ֤ף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>upon the shoulders</n> פְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <sup>6430 </sup> <n>of the Philistines</n> יָ֔מָּה <sup>3220 </sup> <n>toward the west</n> יַחְדָּ֖ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> יָבֹ֣זּוּ <sup>962 </sup> <n>they shall spoil</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>them</n> קֶ֑דֶם <sup>6924 </sup> <n>of the east</n> אֱד֤וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>upon Edom</n> וּמוֹאָב֙ <sup>4124 </sup> <n>and Moab</n> מִשְׁל֣וֹח <sup>4916 </sup> <n>they shall lay</n> יָדָ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>their hand</n> וּבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and the children</n> עַמּ֖וֹן <sup>5983 </sup> <n>of Ammon</n> מִשְׁמַעְתָּֽם׃ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>listen</n>
15: וְהֶחֱרִ֣ים <sup>2763 </sup> <n>shall utterly destroy</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֵ֚ת <sup>853 </sup> לְשׁ֣וֹן <sup>3956 </sup> <n>the tongue</n> יָם־ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of the Egyptian</n> וְהֵנִ֥יף <sup>5130 </sup> <n>shall he shake</n> יָד֛וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הַנָּהָ֖ר <sup>5104 </sup> <n>over the river</n> בַּעְיָ֣ם <sup>5868 </sup> <n>and with his mighty</n> רוּח֑וֹ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>wind</n> וְהִכָּ֙הוּ֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and shall smite</n> לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <sup>7651 </sup> <n>it in the seven</n> נְחָלִ֔ים <sup>5158 </sup> <n>streams</n> וְהִדְרִ֖יךְ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>and make [men] go over</n> בַּנְּעָלִֽים׃ <sup>5275 </sup> <n>dryshod</n>
16: וְהָיְתָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be a</n> מְסִלָּ֔ה <sup>4546 </sup> <n>And there shall be an highway</n> לִשְׁאָ֣ר <sup>7605 </sup> <n>for the remnant</n> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of his people</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִשָּׁאֵ֖ר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>shall be left</n> מֵֽאַשּׁ֑וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>from Assyria</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָֽיְתָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>like as it was to Israel</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> עֲלֹת֖וֹ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>that he came up</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n>
